HeartbeatMsg

public HeartbeatMsg(java.nio.ByteBuffer wireForm)
             throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    WireFormException,
                    java.io.IOException
Constructor - Creates a heartbeat message from the wire formatted byte array. This constructor does not use the usual pattern of simply extending the super(byte[]) sonstructor because it wants to retain the wire and byte buffer for lazy unmarshalling later.

Parameters:
wireForm -
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

readWireForm

protected void readWireForm(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            WireFormException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Read the attributes from the wire format. Note that some of the attributes (views, msgLinks and test interface) are not read here. These are read on demand. These attributes are not likely to be needed often - so we only unmarshall them when we have to.

Overrides:
readWireForm in class TimedMsg
Parameters:
buf - byte[]
Throws:
java.io.IOException
WireFormException
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
